required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Double-blinded, Vehicle Controlled Study to Evaluate Efficacy & Tolerance of Bakuchiol and Ethyl Linoleate on Acne
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Vehicle Controlled, Monocentric Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Tolerance of Synergistic Combination of Bakuchiol and Ethyl Linoleate on Mild to Moderate Acne Vulgaris

brief_summary.textblock: Subjects will be assigned to a active cream or vehicle to compare the cosmetic effects. This will take place over a 12 week period.

primary_outcome.description: IGA score of zero (clear) or one (almost clear)
Percent reductions in facial lesion counts for inflammatory and noninflammatory

secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in Global Face Total Lesion Count

arm_group.description: Synergistic combination of Bakuchiol and Ethyl Linoleate

intervention.description: A synergistic combination of Bakuchiol and Ethyl Linoleate

patient_data.ipd_description: No plan on sharing IPD to other researchers
